alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Eyewall of Hurricane Ian Approaching Northwestern Sections of Collier County... Hurricane Ian continues to move north northeast around 9 mph. With this movement, radar trends indicate the eyewall of the hurricane may move over portions of northwestern section of Collier county through the remainder of the afternoon. Wind gusts in excess of 100 mph have been observed in the Fort Myers area within the eyewall, and damaging hurricane force winds are expected to move across northwestern sections Collier county over the next few hours. HAZARD...Hurricane force winds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Widespread damage is expected. Locations impacted include... Immokalee, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, North Naples, Vineyards, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Quail Creek Estate and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...>100 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in this area should seek shelter immediately! This is a very dangerous situation.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
